DataElement.preferredName: Blood Pressure Excursion Anesthesia Procedure Induction Until Fifteen Minute Post Occurrence Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A record of the BP excursions from the time of anesthesia induction to 15 minutes post.  Note the duration of variances of greater than 20 mmHg from the patient's pre-operative baseline.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Blood Pressure Excursion Anesthesia Procedure Induction Until Fifteen Minute Post Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Instances where blood pressure is outside of established parameters._A loss of feeling or awareness caused by drugs or other substances. Anesthesia keeps patients from feeling pain during surgery or other procedures. Local anesthesia is a loss of feeling in one small area of the body. Regional anesthesia is a loss of feeling in a part of the body, such as an arm or leg. General anesthesia is a loss of feeling and a complete loss of awareness that feels like a very deep sleep._The act of bringing about something._Up to the point of some specific time or event._A natural number greater than 14 and less than 16 and the quantity that it denotes._A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Instances where blood pressure is outside of established parameters.

Property.preferredName: Anesthesia Procedure Induction Until Fifteen Minute Post Occurrence
Property.preferredDefinition: A loss of feeling or awareness caused by drugs or other substances. Anesthesia keeps patients from feeling pain during surgery or other procedures. Local anesthesia is a loss of feeling in one small area of the body. Regional anesthesia is a loss of feeling in a part of the body, such as an arm or leg. General anesthesia is a loss of feeling and a complete loss of awareness that feels like a very deep sleep.:The act of bringing about something.:Up to the point of some specific time or event.:A natural number greater than 14 and less than 16 and the quantity that it denotes.:A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.:Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Treatment with a pharmacological substance that produces a loss of feeling.
The act of bringing about something.
Up to the point of some specific time or event.
A natural number greater than 14 and less than 16 and the quantity that it denotes.
A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.
Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.
